titleStmt.title: A declaration of the people of God in scorn called Quakers, to all magistrates and people.
titleStmt.author: Crook, John, 1617-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Simmons, at the Bull and Mouth near Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: John Crook [and fifteen others].
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
